entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
